2015-06-30.lead_paragraph: Stocks slumped on Wall Street and fell sharply in Europe and Asia as Greece’s difficulties spread worries about possible broader harm to financial systems.
2015-06-30.abstract: Global markets react negatively to closure of Greek banks and possibility that country may default.

headline.main: Greece’s Debt Crisis Sends Stocks Falling Around the Globe
headline.print_headline: Wariness About Greece’s Next Move Sends Markets Down

byline.original: By DAVID JOLLY and KEITH BRADSHER
